body:
Welcome to my first Avicus UHC. This will be a FFA Cutclean. There are only 14 slots for this, but if this goes well I may consider hosting larger matches. I understand this is on the Fourth of July, but seen as it is a EU game I don't expect Americans to come.

The match is moderated by:

-Legoche

-Javipepe

Gamemode Explanation:

FFA - A free for all, everybody is solo.

Cutclean - Ores drop smelted, killing animals drops smelted food and a few other tweaks.


Server Info:

-Server Ip: 37.59.134.176:25592

-Provider: CubedHost

-Location: Amsterdam, Netherlands, Europe

-Ram: 2GB

-Version: 1.7.5

-Slots: 14 (Not as many for my first one, and I will be white listing my friends first)

Game info:

-Whitelist is off at July 4th 6PM BST

-World Size is 1000x1000, and the border is Circular.

-Stalking is not allowed, this will result in a ban from future games.

-PvP is on 15 minutes into the game. IPvP will result in a ban from future games.

-Stealing is allowed

-Meetup is 60 minutes in, it will be announced ingame.

-Nether is on

-Portal trapping is not allowed, camping is.

-Golden heads are on, healing 4 hearts. Absorption is on.

-Tier 2 potions are off, so are Regeneration ones (Duh.)

-Horses are on, no nerfs.

-Apple rates are vanilla, same as flint rates.

-NO STRIPMINING

-Rollercoastering is allowed

-Staircasing has to start above Y=32

-Digging to players/sounds is allowed.

Rules

-Hacking is a permanent ban

-Being rude or spamming is a permanent ban, swearing is allowed but racism, sexism and highly offensive words are not.

-If you don't make it into the match, don't rage at me for it.

-If you die, don't rage at me for it.

-Basically just act normal and you should be fine ;)


Disclaimer:
THERE ARE NO SIGNUPS, JOIN ON THE DAY AT THE CORRECT TIME AND YOU SHOULD MAKE IT IN. IT COULD FILL UP FAST, AND BE FULL, OR IT COULD NOT FILL UP. IF YOU DON'T MAKE IT IN THIS IS NOT MY FAULT, I ALSO HAVE THE RIGHT TO PREWHITELIST MY FRIENDS. I WILL ALSO BE RECORDING THIS.



THE MATCH IS OVER
